resources.string: This application is not licensed. Please purchase it from Android Market.

This is the free sample version of "Music by Numbers: Scales Guide". The full version incudes: - Minor Harmonic - Minor Melodic - Chromatic scales - Major Arpeggios - Minor Arpeggios - Contrary Motion Scales - Pentatonic Scales It is also ad free. If you like this app you can buy the full version here.
If you like this app you can buy the full version that includes all of the Major, Harmonic Minor, Melodic Minor, Major and Minor Arpeggios, Chromatic, Contrary Motions and Pentatonic Scales
